page.title: 19ELLESMERE PORT INDOOR CENTRE
page.content: { E.P.I.C}is Ellesmere Port's main {leisure centre.}It is located on the edge of the town's Central Business District, on the corner of Civic Way and McGarva Way. Opened in the{early 1980's}it provides many activities in the same building. These include swimming, squash, badminton, volleyball, weight-lifting, rollerskating, sauna and a{cinema. A recent survey discovered that most users live within{4Kms}of the centre compared with{10Kms}for the rival centre in{Chester. The most popular activity at the centre is{swimming}and most people questioned reported that they visited the centre at least once a week.
